summary: Admin panel overhaul testing - 87.9% backend pass rate. Case sensitivity bug FIXED and verified. Admin UI loads correctly with all 8 tabs. Session persistence issue blocks thorough frontend testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Admin sessions expire very quickly during testing (~30 seconds)
minor_bugs.impact: Blocks thorough frontend admin UI testing

ui_bugs.issue: Admin sessions expire too quickly, preventing complete UI testing

passed_tests: ✅ CASE SENSITIVITY BUG FIX VERIFIED - admin user search now case-insensitive
✅ Admin access control - non-admin users get 'Page Not Found' or redirect to login
✅ Admin authorization - all admin endpoints require admin role (403 for non-admin)
✅ GET /api/admin/users with sort_by=points&sort_order=desc - returns sorted users
✅ GET /api/admin/users with filter_status=online/offline/banned - returns filtered results
✅ GET /api/admin/users/{user_id} - returns full user profile with related data counts
✅ POST /api/admin/users/{user_id}/change-password - changes password without old password
✅ POST /api/admin/users/{user_id}/ban and unban endpoints work correctly
✅ Admin page sidebar shows all 8 tabs (Dashboard, Users, Matches, System, Prediction Monitor, Favorites, Notifications, Analytics)
✅ Admin dashboard loads with stats and recent admin actions
✅ Backend admin API endpoints: 29/33 tests passed (87.9% success rate)

medium: Fix session persistence - admin sessions expire too quickly (30-60 seconds), preventing thorough frontend testing
Once session persistence is fixed, re-test Users tab filter chips and action icons interaction
low: Verify eye icon message review functionality works end-to-end
Test ban/unban button functionality in UI
